content:
ServicePartitionInformation Class

Definition

Represents the base class for describing partitions.

In this Article

[System.Runtime.Serialization.KnownType(typeof(System.Fabric.Int64RangePartitionInformation))]
[System.Runtime.Serialization.KnownType(typeof(System.Fabric.NamedPartitionInformation))]
[System.Runtime.Serialization.KnownType(typeof(System.Fabric.SingletonPartitionInformation))]
public abstract class ServicePartitionInformation
Inheritance
Object
ServicePartitionInformation
Derived
Int64RangePartitionInformation
NamedPartitionInformation
SingletonPartitionInformation
Attributes
System.Runtime.Serialization.KnownType System.Runtime.Serialization.KnownType System.Runtime.Serialization.KnownType

Remarks

, , and
all derive from this type.

Properties

Id

Specifies the partition ID for this partition as a GUID.
Kind

Describes the type of partition.
